name: ASOCIACIÓN PARA LA DEFENSA DE LOS INTERESES DE LA ABOGACÍA
goal: La defensa de los intereses de los abogados individuales y de los profesionales del derecho que trabajan en despachos de pequeña y mediana dimensión. La defensa y promoción de una justicia independiente, con medios, cercana y accesible para los ciudadanos.
interests: Banking and financial services, Borders and Security, Budget, Business and Industry, Climate Action, Communication, Competition, Consumers, Culture, Culture and media, Customs, Digital economy and society, Economy, finance and the euro, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Environment, Food Safety, Fraud prevention, Humanitarian aid and civil protection, Institutional affairs, International co-operation and development, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Migration and asylum, Public Health, Research and innovation, Single market, Sport, Taxation, Trans-European Networks, Transport
euInitiatives:
Cross border legal aid
EPPO
Small Claims
Data protection
Immigration legislative packages

Services Package
Access to Justice
Anti Money Laundering Directives
Tax intermediaries
